edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff
Interface Editable

All Known Implementing Classes:
EditableTextLine
public interface Editable

The interface Editable holds the methods append, insert, and replace.

Method Summary
 void append(java.lang.String fragment)
          Append will be assigned to add a string fragment to the end of _TextLine
 void insert(int index, java.lang.String fragment)
          Insert will be assigned to insert string fragment at index 0
 void replace(int start, int end, java.lang.String fragment)
          Replace will replace from a starting index to an ending index with the string fragment
 

Method Detail

append

void append(java.lang.String fragment)
Append will be assigned to add a string fragment to the end of _TextLine

Parameters:
fragment - the string to add at the end of _TextLine

insert

void insert(int index,
            java.lang.String fragment)
Insert will be assigned to insert string fragment at index 0

Parameters:
index - the index at which to insert the fragment
fragment - the fragment that will be inserted at index

replace

void replace(int start,
             int end,
             java.lang.String fragment)
Replace will replace from a starting index to an ending index with the string fragment

Parameters:
start - where to start replacing
end - where to end replacing
fragment - string to insert at start index
